snippet.title: The Ghost of Nichishima Early access Official Teaser
snippet.description:
The Ghost of NIchishima comes to Steam early access this January 29th. Here is a teaser trailer for the prologue featured in the early access. 

#Horrorgame #horrorgaming #indiegame
